sentence.Network_en: Four new species of the genus Begonia L . ( Begoniaceae ) from Guangxi, China are described and illustrated.
sentence.Network_cn: 描述了广西秋海棠属 ( 秋海棠科 ) 的侧膜胎座组和秋海棠组4新种.
